verbs.description: H.R. McMaster Sr . , the father of the general and former Trump cabinet member , [V: was] found dead on April 13th at a senior care facility in Roxborough .

[ARG1: H.R. McMaster Sr . , the father of the general and former Trump cabinet member ,] was [V: found] [ARGM-PRD: dead] [ARGM-TMP: on April 13th] [ARGM-LOC: at a senior care facility in Roxborough] .
